TopicTitle: PULSAR: Lost Colony. Why have we not funded this yet?

Articles.Content:
http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/leafygames/pulsar-lost-colony

Why is this not funded yet? It's like multiplayer FTL. Seriously. AWESOME!

Also if you own G-mod final frontier is a similar upcoming gamemode.
Also Final Frontier can be played and modified to make it better here: https://github.com/Metapyziks/finalfrontier

http://www.kickstarter.com/projects/leafygames/pulsar-lost-colony

Why is this not funded yet?

Well, for one it's only been two days as of when you asked this question. Right now it's 3 days and it's more than halfway to its goal with 27 days to go. If it keeps going at the same rate($7333/day) they'll be at $230,000 by the end of the funding period.
Anyone who is interested, 20 days remaining, it's 110% funded.

Holy.

This is gonna take off like heck.
